text: Maseeh ibne Mariyam iske siwa kuch nahin ke bas ek Rasool tha, ussey pehle aur bhi bahut se Rasool guzar chuke thay, uski Maa ek raast-baaz(righteous) aurat thi, aur woh dono khana khate thay, dekho hum kis tarah inke saamne haqeeqat ki nishaniyan wazeh karte hain, phir dekho yeh kidhar ulte phire jatey hain
